Additional Paid-in Capital: adjustments to additional paid in capital dividends in excess of retained earnings
adjustments to additional paid in capital settlement of forward contracts for share repurchase
Treasury Stock: treasury stock retired cost method amount
treasury stock value acquired cost method
treasury stock value acquired excise tax

Net Income: net income loss available to common stockholders before participating securities

Total Other Comprehensive Income: other comprehensive income loss net of tax

Other Equity Adjustments: cumulative effect of new accounting principle
other comprehensive income loss net of tax prior to error correction

Other Stock Issuance: stock issued during period value acquisitions
stock issued during period value new issues and treasury stock reissued
Stock-Based Compensation: adjustments to additional paid in capital sharebased compensation requisite service period recognition value

Stock Repurchases: stock repurchased and retired during period value
__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share declared
minority interest decrease from distributions to noncontrolling interest holders
noncontrolling interest increase from subsidiary equity issuance
